reviewText: I grew up watching this show and always though it was neat that Jordi was also on the show. Watching the books come to life enlightened a love for reading. With now having my own 2 under 4, I had a hard time getting them to sit down to hear a story. I bought this set to help ignite that same passion, and I am glad to say it works. My four year old is constantly asking for the Rainbow dvd.
This was given as a gift to the teacher!  She was ecstatic to receive the gift pack and kids were happy with new educational DVDs.  Thanks!
